version_description:
- New: Remove Ads Option
- New: Share Option

Thanks for using Relax Sounds!

Thank you very much for using Relax Sounds! This update includes:

- 10 new sounds (available via in-app purchase that also deactivates all ads permanently)
- iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus adjustments
- 6 new languages
- Bug fixes & performance improvements

If you like Relax Sounds, let everybody know by leaving a review at the App Store. Thanks! :)

Michael

This app has been updated by Apple to display the Apple Watch app icon.

Thank you for using the Relax Sounds App! This update includes:

- 2 new PRO sounds: Whales & Heartbeat
- iPad Pro optimizations
- Bug fixes

If you like the Relax Sounds App, please let everybody know by leaving a review at the App Store. Thanks! :)
